review: Was stoked about getting this item.  I even moved the Apple TV to the basement.  Upon first set up everything went well.  Easy.  Then after a few days it started failing.  Over and over.  We were haunted by the error messages and inability to reconnect the device.  What a piece of junk.  Pay more for the Apple TV.  There's a reason it costs more.  That reason:  it works.

review: Bought a "smart TV" two years ago, the apps on it are limited and never work right. Broke down and bought Chromecast and have not looked back. Now we can watch Netflix without having to wait for it to buffer every so often. Love that we can view our pictures on our TV now without downloading 3rd party software to that works with our type of TV. With Chromecast, we can use our phones as the remote, or our tablets, or our computers; which ever is near. Wish we would have just bought Chromecast sooner and saved the money that we spent on the not so smart "smart TV".
